All Classes

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Connect4Client
    Connect4Client connects to the Connect 4 server and facilitates gameplay for the player.
    Connect4ComputerPlayer
    Connect4ComputerPlayer class generates moves for the computer player.
    Connect4GUI
    Connect4GUI class provides a graphical user interface for Connect4 that communicates with a server for gameplay.
    Connect4Logic
    Connect4Logic class handles the game logic for Connect 4.
    Connect4Server
    core.Connect4Server class manages the server side of the Connect 4 game.
    Connect4TextConsole
    Connect4TextConsole class provides a text-based UI for the Connect 4 game.
    MultiplayerSession
    Executes a multiplayer session between two players.
    SinglePlayerSession
    Executes a single-player session where the player competes against the computer.
